definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就难溶药物与中草药微细化技术作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Exploratory testing, on the other hand, can be more ad hoc.
sentences.chinese: 从另一方面来说，探索性测试可能更加特殊。

sentences.english: The performance of the prototype adopting PPN electronic injection system has been trial-tested.
sentences.chinese: 对采用PPN电喷系统的样机性能进行了探索性试验。

sentences.english: Especially if you do not choose Exploratory Testing.
sentences.chinese: 特别是如果你不知道选择探索性测试的话。

sentences.english: Secondly, on basis of exploring experiment, do the normal experiment to select the chemical composition.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是在探索性实验基础上做正交实验，优选配方。

sentences.english: Thirdly , to put forward the development counter measure of Shandong higher vocational education explorative .
sentences.chinese: 探索性地提出了对山东省高等职业教育的发展对策。

sentences.english: Use Exploratory Testing to generate feedback
sentences.chinese: 使用“探索性测试”来产生反馈。

sentences.english: Utilization of sacchariferous organic wastewater for producing protein of thalis explored.
sentences.chinese: 对含糖废水生产菌体饲料的资源化进行了探索性试验。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the optimization proposal of sensor installation is pointed out inveterately.
sentences.chinese: 同时，探索性地指出传感器安装的优化方案。

sentences.english: The 2002 version shows a shift to an approach based on exploratory testing.
sentences.chinese: 2002版转向了基于探索性测试的方法。

definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
